TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Project extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示具有设计时语义的项目。

span.span: Represents a project with design time semantics.

summary.span: 此类可加载项目文件、编辑项和属性，并可生成项目。

span.span: This class can load project files, edit items and properties and build projects.

summary.span: 使用全局项目集合的全局属性和默认工具版本构造一个空项目。

span.span: Constructs an empty project using the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

Public Sub New ()
public: Project();

summary.span: 使用全局项目集合的全局属性和默认工具版本构造一个空项目。

span.span: Constructs an empty project using the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此项目将添加到全局项目集合，当它被提供的完整路径给源项目文件中，通常通过保存该项目。This project is added to the global project collection when it is given the full path to the source project file, typically by saving the project.

Public Sub New (xml As ProjectRootElement)
public: Project(Microsoft::Build::Construction::ProjectRootElement ^ xml);

span.span: ProjectRootElement to use for evaluation.

summary.span: 使用给定的项目根和全局项目集合的全局属性以及默认工具版本，构造一个空项目并对其进行计算。

span.span: Constructs an empty project and evaluates it using the given project root and the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此项目或给定的项目根提供源项目文件的完整路径时，此项目将添加到全局项目集合。This project is added to the global project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to the source project file. 如果评估失败，将引发 InvalidProjectFileException。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails. 如果已存在一个等效的项目将引发 InvalidOperationException 加载项目集合中。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already an equivalent project loaded in the project collection.

span.span: Constructs an empty project using the given project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此项目将添加到给定的项目集合，当它被提供的完整路径给源项目文件中，通常通过保存该项目。This project is added to the given project collection when it is given the full path to the source project file, typically by saving the project.

summary.span: 利用给定的源项目文件以及全局项目集合的全局属性和默认工具版本，构造一个项目并对其进行计算。

span.span: Constructs a project and evaluates it from the given source project file and with the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项目将添加到全局项目集合。The project is added to the global project collection. 如果在计算此源项目文件的项目集合中已一个项目，将引发 InvalidOperationException。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already a project in the project collection that evaluates this source project file. 可能会引发与 IO 相关的异常。May throw IO-related exceptions.

span.span: If the evaluation fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将该项追加到第一个项组，其中不能有条件，但没有子级或其第一个子级是相同类型的项。Appends the item to the first item group that does not have a condition and has either no children or whose first child is an item of the same type. 最大程度地计算结果:-与所有项将展开。Evaluates on a best-effort basis: -expands with all items. 可能使用新的项下面的 XML 中定义的项，即使它们不是在实际计算。Items that are defined in the XML below the new item may be used, even though in a real evaluation they would not be. 评估仅此项目。Only this item is evaluated. 不会影响其他可能依赖于它的项。Other items that might depend on it are not affected. 这是一种便于理解它未必会保留完全自我一致的状态中的项目之前重新评估。This is a convenience that it is understood does not necessarily leave the project in a perfectly self consistent state until reevaluation.

summary.span: 获取某些属性的可能值的集合，这些属性用于计算有关属性、属性组、导入和时间的条件。

span.span: Gets a collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 返回某些属性的可能值的集合，这些属性用于计算有关属性、属性组、导入和时间的条件。

span.span: Returns a collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 该集合采用规范格式。

span.span: The collection is in canonical form.

value.span: 条目的名称是要计算的属性的名称，值是可能的属性值的列表。

span.span: The name of the entry is the name of the property to be evaluated, and the value is a list of possible property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果在项目中的属性上存在以下条件： Condition="'$(Configuration)|$（平台） = = 调试|x 86'"Condition="'$(Configuration) = = 发布"表将填入 {"配置"，{"调试"，"发布"}} {"平台"，{"x86"}} Visual Studio 使用此集合来确定项目中定义的配置For example, if the following conditions existed on properties in a project: Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)' == 'Debug|x86'" Condition="'$(Configuration)' == 'Release'" the table would be populated with { "Configuration", { "Debug", "Release" }} { "Platform", { "x86" }} This collection is used by Visual Studio to determine the configurations defined in the project

Public Sub MarkDirty ()
public: void MarkDirty();

summary.span: 将此项目标记为已修改。

span.span: Marks this project as modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很少需要显式调用此方法，因为自动影响项目的所有编辑将其都标记为已修改。It is seldom necessary to call this method explicitly, because all edits affecting a project automatically mark it as modified. 但是，有时，必须调用此方法。Sometimes, however, this method must be called. 例如，项目可能具有其条件取决于磁盘存在的文件的导入元素。For example, a project may have an Import element whose condition depends on a file that exists on a disk. 如果该文件不存在在评估时，并创建它时评估后，则项目必须显式标记为已修改。If that file does not exist at evaluation time, and it is created after evaluation, then the project must be explicitly marked as modified. 方法使用此属性来确定是否需要评估。The method uses this property to determine if an evaluation is necessary.

public: bool RemoveItem(Microsoft::Build::Evaluation::ProjectItem ^ item);

span.span: The item to be removed.

summary.span: 从项目中移除一个项。

span.span: Removes an item from the project.

summary.span: 要移除的项必须存在于项目中，并且不得源自于导入的文件。

span.span: The item to be removed must be present in the project, and must not originate from an imported file.

returns.span: 如果该项存在于此计算的项目中，则返回 true；否则返回 false。

span.span: Returns true if the item is present in this evaluated project; otherwise false.

returns.span: 此方法通常会返回 true，原因是，如果请求的项不存在，则此方法会引发异常。

span.span: Normally this method returns true, since if the requested item is not present, the method throws an exception.

returns.span: 不过，如果该项仅存在于 ItemsIgnoringCondition 集合中，则此方法将返回 false。

span.span: If the item is present only in the ItemsIgnoringCondition collection, however, the method returns false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含项的项组变为空，则它也将移除。If the item group containing the item becomes empty, it is also removed. 如果该项源自于通配符或分号分隔的表达式，该表达式是第一次扩展到多个项。If the item originates from a wildcard or semicolon-separated expression, the expression is first expanded into multiple items. 项目已更新，但重新计算之后才会进行任何进一步评估。The project is updated, but no further evaluation occurs until reevaluation. 例如，如果项删除类型为"i"，"j"从评估"@(i)"重新评估之前不会对其进行修改。For example, if an item of type "i" is removed, "j" which is evaluated from "@(i)" is not modified until reevaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不没有具有给定名称的任何属性，更新具有给定名称具有本身或其属性组中，任何条件的最后一个的现有属性，除非它来源于导入的文件。If there is no property with the given name, updates the last existing property with the given name that has no condition on itself or its property group, unless it originated in an imported file. 第一个属性组中不带条件，在最后一个现有属性组之后，其他的项目开始时创建属性组如有必要，否则，将新属性添加。Otherwise, adds a new property in the first property group without a condition, creating a property group if necessary after the last existing property group, else at the start of the project. 评估将尽最大努力上的发生。Evaluation takes place on a best-effort basis. 以下新的属性项目源中定义的属性可能用于评估。Properties that are defined in the project source following the new property may be used for evaluation. 计算此属性。Only this property is evaluated. 其他可能依赖于它的属性不受影响。Other properties that might depend on it are not affected.

summary.span: 当宿主希望对项目进行大量读写操作并希望临时牺牲准确性以换取性能，则可以使用此标志。

span.span: This is useful when the host expects to make a number of reads and writes to the project, and wants to temporarily sacrifice correctness for performance.
